## Loading the data
```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
load("individuals.rda")
```

```{r}
library(individuals)
Women<-individuals %>%
  filter(cmte_id == "C00473918"| 
         cmte_id == "C00530766",
         transaction_dt <= "11062012",
         entity_type == "IND")

```
